metadata.title: TACo Protocol Use Case Diagram - Structured Metadata
metadata.purpose: This file provides structured, machine-readable information about the TACo Protocol Use Case Diagram, allowing AI assistants to understand the semantic meaning of the diagram elements without needing to interpret the visual representation.
workflowInstructions: When updating the visual diagram in SAME-FILE-NAME.drawio, also update this file
Keep all IDs consistent between this file and references in documentation
Ensure descriptions accurately reflect current protocol implementation

title: TACo Protocol Use Case Diagram
description: Illustrates the interactions between actors and use cases in the TACo Protocol system

actors.name: Adopting Developer
actors.description: Cohort Authority that adopts the TACo protocol and sets network parameters

actors.name: Data Producer
actors.description: Entity that encrypts data using the TACo protocol

actors.name: Data Consumer
actors.description: Entity that requests and decrypts data when conditions are met

actors.name: Node Operator
actors.description: Manages nodes that participate in distributed key generation and provide decryption services

useCases.name: Distributed Key Generation (DKG)
useCases.description: Process to generate distributed cryptographic keys across nodes. DKG happens only once at network setup, not periodically.

useCases.name: Manage Cohort
useCases.description: Activities related to managing the cohort of nodes, including economic staking and parameters set by the cohortAuthority

useCases.name: Set Network Parameters
useCases.description: Configuration of network parameters for the TACo protocol

useCases.name: Encrypt Data
useCases.description: Process of encrypting data using the TACo protocol. Encryption operations are performed locally by data owners using the public key.

useCases.name: Specify Access Conditions
useCases.description: Define conditions that must be met for decryption

useCases.name: Validate Eligibility for Encryption
useCases.description: Verification that the data producer is eligible to use the encryption service

useCases.name: Verify Conditions
useCases.description: Verification of access conditions before providing decryption fragments

useCases.name: Provide Decryption Fragments
useCases.description: Nodes provide decryption fragments when access conditions are met

useCases.name: Combine Fragments to Decrypt Data
useCases.description: Process of combining decryption fragments to reconstruct the decryption key

useCases.name: Decrypt Data
useCases.description: Process of decrypting data using the reconstructed key

relationships.description: Initiates and participates in distributed key generation
Sets network parameters for the TACo protocol
Encrypts data using the TACo protocol
Provides decryption fragments when conditions are met
Decryption includes obtaining fragments from nodes
Decryption includes combining fragments to reconstruct the key

systemBoundary.name: TACo Protocol System
systemBoundary.description: Boundary encompassing all TACo protocol operations
